system.description: You hunger for human blood, flesh, or emotions; pick one. When you feed on someone, roll with BLOOD.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, your hunger gets the best of you, and everyone suffers.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a 7-9, choose 2:

  • You heal 1-harm or take +1 forward
  • You learn a secret about your prey
  • Your prey doesn’t suffer 3-harm (ap)

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a 10+, all 3:

  • You heal 1-harm or take +1 forward
  • You learn a secret about your prey
  • Your prey doesn’t suffer 3-harm (ap)
